title: The Bachelorette SPOILER: Angie Kent kisses intruder Ryan Anderson
text:
The Bachelorette intruder Ryan Anderson certainly impressed Angie Kent on Wednesday's show.

But the 32-year-old dog lover, who already knew Angie before entering the series, is set to take things up a notch in an upcoming episode.

In scenes expected to air on Thursday, Ryan was spotted kissing the former Gogglebox star, 29, as they set sail on a romantic boat trip.

Getting cosy! The Bachelorette's Ryan Anderson and Angie Kent were spotted filming their first single date in Sydney in early August. Their date is expected to air on Thursday

Angie looked comfortable with Ryan during their first single date, as the pair stood on the boat's deck.

Holding hands, Ryan gazed sweetly at the Bachelorette while they chatted in front of the camera crew.

Eventually, he wrapped his arms around Angie and pulled her in for a passionate kiss.

In love? Ryan gazed sweetly at the Bachelorette while they chatted in front of the camera crew

Smitten! Angie looked comfortable with Ryan during their first single date, as the pair stood on the boat's deck

Sealed with a kiss! Ryan wrapped his arms around Angie and pulled her in for a passionate kiss

A smitten-looking Angie then threw her arms around Ryan's neck as he held her close.

Dressed in winter coats, the pair wrapped up warm to protect themselves from Sydney's windy weather.

The scene was filmed several months ago, around early August.

Hold me! A smitten-looking Angie then threw her arms around Ryan's neck as he held her close

Beaming! Wearing a grey coat and black jeans, Angie accessorised with a glittering headband

Wearing a grey coat and black jeans, Angie accessorised her outfit with a glittering headband.

Meanwhile, RSPCA worker Ryan showed off his sense of style in white chinos and a black duffel coat.

Ryan was introduced to The Bachelorette on Wednesday's episode as a dog handler assisting with a group date challenge.

Introduction: Ryan was introduced to The Bachelorette on Wednesday's episode as a dog handler assisting with a group date challenge

But it was soon revealed that Ryan would be joining the cast as an intruder.

He quickly hit it off with Angie, with whom he'd shared flirty texts before she was cast as the Bachelorette, making the other men jealous.

The Bachelorette continues Thursday at 7:30pm on Channel 10

Sparks fly! But it was soon revealed that Ryan would be joining the cast as an intruder
description: In scenes expected to air on Thursday, Ryan was spotted kissing the former Gogglebox star as they set sail on a romantic boat trip
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
